context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Jira skill's config command to display active configuration settings. The solution must invoke cmd_config or the equivalent CLI config show subcommand and correctly present all stored values including connection details and project-specific defaults.

checklist.name: Config command invoked
checklist.description: The solution invokes the Jira skill's config show functionality, either by calling cmd_config directly or by running jira.py with the 'config show' subcommand arguments

checklist.name: Connection details displayed
checklist.description: The output includes the Jira base URL (from JiraDefaults or get_credentials) and the authenticated user email address

checklist.name: Default scope shown
checklist.description: When a default JQL scope is present in the configuration (via get_jira_defaults), it is printed in the configuration output

checklist.name: Project defaults displayed
checklist.description: When project-specific defaults exist (via get_project_defaults), each project key and its associated default issue type and priority are shown
